VXLIB Function Reference

Magnitude

OpenVX Function Description

  • Implements the Gradient Magnitude Computation Kernel.

OpenVX Function Reference Page

  • https://www.khronos.org/registry/vx/specs/1.1/html/dd/df2/group__group__vision__function__magnitude.html

VXLIB APIs

  • VXLIB_magnitude_i16s_i16s_o16s : Input and output images are S16 format
